item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, November 21, 2024 at 3:25 AM UTC
item.description:
1. What is the origin of the lake tank image that has become a meme? (2021) (495 points | 107 comments)
2. Niantic announces "Large Geospatial Model" trained on Pokémon Go player data (221 points | 163 comments)
3. Building Databases over a Weekend (26 points | discuss)
4. Show HN: We Open-Sourced Our Compost Monitoring Tech – Use It for Your Projects (20 points | 4 comments)
5. Z-Library Helps Students to Overcome Academic Poverty, Study Finds (151 points | 30 comments)
6. Electrobun: Cross-platform desktop applications written in TypeScript (30 points | 11 comments)
7. AAA – Analytical Anti-Aliasing (471 points | 71 comments)
8. Weight-loss drug found to shrink heart muscle in mice, human cells (145 points | 164 comments)
9. AlphaQubit: AI to identify errors in Quantum Computers (91 points | 37 comments)
10. Doxx/Darkflare: DarkFlare TCPoCDN (TCP over CDN) (37 points | 2 comments)
11. Vapi (YC W21) Is Hiring Founding Senior Engineer (Front End) ( | hide)
12. Show HN: Self-Host Next.js in Production (84 points | 40 comments)
13. SQL, Homomorphisms and Constraint Satisfaction Problems (114 points | 10 comments)
14. Show HN: Autotab – Programmable AI browser for turning web tasks into APIs (62 points | 36 comments)
15. Undergraduates with family income below $200k will be tuition-free at MIT (369 points | 270 comments)
16. How good are American roads? (171 points | 376 comments)
17. Bit-twiddling optimizations in Zed's Rope (91 points | 31 comments)
18. Fashion History Timeline (6 points | discuss)
19. Google stops letting sites like Forbes rule search for "Best CBD Gummies" (177 points | 106 comments)
20. Does the Internet Route Around Damage? – Baltic Sea Cable Cuts (46 points | 8 comments)
21. Gregglogger (8 points | 3 comments)
22. Apple fights to keep DOJ antitrust suit from reaching trial (42 points | 21 comments)
23. Between the Booms: AI in Winter – Communications of the ACM (56 points | 35 comments)
24. Pipe Viewer – A Unix Utility You Should Know About (114 points | 24 comments)
25. Europe's Internet resilience mitigates impact of submarine cable cuts (104 points | 21 comments)
26. Exploring the Cost and Feasibility of Battery-Electric Ships (26 points | 52 comments)
27. Show HN: Cardo ‒ Open Source desktop podcast client (77 points | 27 comments)
28. A Second Search for Bash Scripting Alternatives (15 points | 35 comments)
29. Bird flu in Canada may have mutated to become more transmissible to humans (59 points | 25 comments)
30. La Basilica Di San Pietro (125 points | 58 comments)
